timeline.bodyText:
Can you please move noOfRetries == 0 to a local variable to improve readability?
Btw are you sure of this check? I think it should be == 1.
The if condition for the recursion is noOfRetries > 0 so the only reason why you can get a 0 here is because this is the init value and it has probably no sense :)

replies.bodyText: sure, of course you're right, the check is strict when you can do more retries, so boolean strict = noOfRetries > 0
